participant_1.background:
I am a history buff.
I am engaged to be married.
I love animals and like working with them.
My parents are divorced.
I am in a local theater company.

participant_2.background:
I like victorian things.
I collect dolls.
I am a romantic.
I like antiques.
I like jazz.

content.text: Hi, I'm looking for someone to talk to.
Hi, I'm free to chat. What would you like to talk about?
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to collect dolls, listen to jazz, and read about victorian times.
That sounds interesting. I like history too. What's your favorite historical period?
I'm really interested in the Victorian era. I love the architecture, fashion, and music from that time.
I've always wanted to visit London during the Victorian era. I think it would be so cool to see all the old buildings and wear the clothes from that time.
Me too! I've been to London a few times, but I've never been there during the Victorian era. It would be so amazing to see it all in person.
Maybe we should plan a trip to London together!
That would be so fun! I would love to explore the city with you.
Great! We can start planning right away.
Me neither. This is going to be so much fun!
